channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟠 23:26 Attention !!! Threat of use of managed aviation bombs (cabin).
item.description: 🟠 23:26 Attention !!! Threat of use of managed aviation bombs (cabin).#Vasylivsky_ district This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 23:14 Drawing of anxiety in Dnipropetrovsk Oblast. Present that anxiety is still in:- Kamiansky district- Novomoskovsk district- Dniprovsky district- Pavlograd district- Sinelnikovsky rayon- Marganets and Manganese territorial community and Nikopol Territorial Territorial.
item.description: 🟡 23:14 Drawing of anxiety in Dnipropetrovsk Oblast. Present that anxiety is still in:- Kamiansky district- Novomoskovsk district- Dniprovsky district- Pavlograd district- Sinelnikovsky rayon- Marganets and Manganese territorial community and Nikopol Territorial Territorial. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
